entities.name: PartyRelationship
entities.description: A business relationship between two parties

attributes.name: party_relationship_id
attributes.description: Unique identifier for this relationship

attributes.name: from_party_id
attributes.description: Foreign key to the Party entity (source party)

attributes.name: to_party_id
attributes.description: Foreign key to the Party entity (target party)

attributes.name: relationship_type
attributes.description: Type of relationship between the parties

attributes.name: relationship_validity_period
attributes.description: The period for which this relationship is valid

attributes.name: start_date
attributes.description: Date when this relationship started

attributes.name: end_date
attributes.description: Date when this relationship ended

attributes.name: status
attributes.description: Current status of the relationship

attributes.name: description
attributes.description: Description of the relationship

attributes.name: priority
attributes.description: Priority of this relationship

attributes.name: is_bidirectional
attributes.description: Flag indicating if this relationship is bidirectional

attributes.name: created_at
attributes.description: Date and time when this record was created

attributes.name: updated_at
attributes.description: Date and time when this record was last updated

attributes.name: deleted_at
attributes.description: Date and time when this record was marked as deleted

entities.name: CustomerRelationship
entities.description: A relationship where one party is a customer of another

attributes.name: party_relationship_id
attributes.description: Foreign key to the PartyRelationship entity

attributes.name: customer_type
attributes.description: Type of customer (e.g., Individual, Business, Government)

attributes.name: customer_category
attributes.description: Category of customer (e.g., Premium, Standard, Basic)

attributes.name: customer_risk_rating
attributes.description: Risk rating of the customer

attributes.name: account_manager_id
attributes.description: ID of the account manager for this customer

attributes.name: lifecycle_stage
attributes.description: Lifecycle stage of the customer (e.g., Prospect, Active, Dormant)

attributes.name: credit_limit
attributes.description: Credit limit for the customer

attributes.name: payment_terms
attributes.description: Payment terms for the customer

attributes.name: onboarding_date
attributes.description: Date when the customer was onboarded

attributes.name: kyc_status
attributes.description: Know Your Customer status

attributes.name: kyc_review_date
attributes.description: Date when KYC was last reviewed
